description:
The Django Admin offers quick solutions and rapid feature development
for new websites. But as your website expands, and datasets grow, it can
become unwieldy and slow. Enter Elasticsearch: an easy way to quickly
accelerate your Django administration tools and searches.

At Grove Collaborative, we’ve experimented with Elasticsearch technology
and developed reusable patterns that brought new life to our aging
Django administration system. This presentation will teach you how to
leverage easy Elasticsearch wins while avoiding common pitfalls.
title: Elasticsearch: Accelerating the Django Admin
